pullrequest.title: Update inertia properties during simulation: part 1

content.raw: @scpeters, something like that could work. That's probably not sufficient though because realizeTopology() creates a virgin state in which basically everything is set to zero. If there was an existing state its values need to get transferred to the new one. Something like `SimbodyPhysics::reinitializeSystemWithCompatibleState()` that would include `newstate=realizeTopology(); newstate.updY()=oldstate.getY(); integ->initialize(newstate);` @hsu already has some similar code in there somewhere for reinitializing a modified System with an *incompatible* state, where he rummages through all the old joints to transfer any state information that is still present in the new state.
